remarks: Lemma for ~ colperpex .  Case 1 of theorem 8.21 of [Schwabhauser] p. 63.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Nov-2019.)
statement:
colperpex.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
colperpex.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
colperpex.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
colperpex.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
colperpex.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
colperpex.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
colperpex.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
colperpex.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
colperpex.4 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
colperpexlem3.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. C e. ( A L B ) ) $.
colperpexlem3 $p |- ( ph -> E. p e. P ( ( A L p ) ( perpG ` G ) ( A L B ) /\ E. t e. P ( ( t e. ( A L B ) \/ A = B ) /\ t e. ( C I p ) ) ) ) $.
